verse: यो विज्ञाने तिष्ठन्विज्ञानादन्तरो यं विज्ञानं न वेद यस्य विज्ञान शरीरं यो विज्ञानमन्तरो यमयत्येष त आत्मान्तर्याम्यमृतः॥

terms.आत्मान्तर्याम्यमृतः: (ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ) - the eternal self, the inner ruler

meaning: Meaning:The one who abides in knowledge, who does not know anyone other than knowledge, whose body is knowledge, who controls knowledge within, this eternal self is the inner ruler.
